Title: The Moonshine War
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Graham Yost (teleplay), Elmore Leonard (story), Graham Yost (story), Elmore Leonard (based on the short story "Fire in the Hole" by), Benjamin Cavell (story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: Raylan tangles with a ruthless Harlan County crime family while hunting for a fugitive sex offender.
